# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that receives events from the text interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UITextInteractionDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Handling text input and interaction events

- **textInput**: The object that interacts with the text input system.
- **UITextInteractionDelegate**: An interface that an object implements to receive information about text interaction events.
